array.value: accuracy - a coefficient, which reflects how close the returned result to the query filter. Range: 0 - 1 (1 - best match)
targetAge - the actual target age in seconds (can be negative)

syntax.param: For whom the query will be made

array.param: Target object to exclude from results. objNull - return every target
Desired side of the target. sideUnknown - any side
Desired target position in format of Position2D or Position3D (only [x,y] is considered). Position tolerance is 200m from the actual position of the target. [] - any position
Desired max age of the target. This will limit returned results to the targets younger than specified age. 0 - any age
